description: The Punk Hazard Arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates explore a mysterious island split between fire and ice, where they encounter Trafalgar Law, form an alliance, and battle against Caesar Clown and his operations.

keyMilestones.description: The Straw Hats successfully capture Caesar Clown using seastone handcuffs, completing the first step of Law's plan to take down Doflamingo.
keyMilestones.significance: This pivotal moment sets in motion the events that will lead to the Dressrosa Arc.
